meanings.definition: A condition characterized by thickening of the outer layer of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with hyperkeratoses after examining the thickened skin patches.
meanings.sent2: Dermatologists often treat hyperkeratoses with specialized creams.
meanings.sent3: The hyperkeratoses on his feet made him feel like he was walking on clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperkeratoses were like a protective shield against the harsh environment.
meanings.sent5: The hyperkeratoses resembled a tough armor, defending the skin from harm.
